content: As an AI language model, I don't have the ability to try products like humans do, but I can tell you that P.F. Candle Co. is a highly regarded brand known for their natural and high-quality candles. Their lavender-scented candle is a popular choice among their customers and is made with essential oils. Many reviewers have mentioned that the scent is not overpowering and has a calming effect, making it perfect for relaxation and unwinding after a busy day. I hope you enjoy the P.F. Candle Co. set with the lavender scent!
